doc.title: Aizliegtas speles
doc.plot: Two unfamiliar and dissimilar families to each other swap one family member for a week. This exciting daily 12 week format reveals what happens when people decides to come into the revolutionary challenge: to leave the closest people and come to live to unknown home. Every week different people: wives, husbands, lovers, young and old, rich and poor. Viewers experience the intrigues, proximity while watching the changing relationships of ordinary people.
